title: Book review | 'The $10 Trillion Dream' by former finance secretary Subhash Chandra Garg is a call to... - Moneycontrol
content: Book review | 'The $10 Trillion Dream' by former finance secretary Subhash Chandra Garg is a call to...  Moneycontrol
description: 'The $10 Trillion Dream' offers a compelling narrative and an expansive blueprint of sorts for a turnaround of the country's economy, but it is not an easy read.
